Container.Name: lms
Container.Overview:
Lightweight Music Server (LMS) is a self-hosted music streaming software: access your music collection from anywhere using a web interface!
Main features: - Recommendation engine - Multi-valued tags: genre, mood, artists, ... - Artist relationships: composer, conductor, lyricist, mixer, performer, producer, remixer - Release types: album, single, EP, compilation, live, ... - MusicBrainz Identifier support to handle duplicated artist and release names - ListenBrainz support for: - Scrobbling and synchronizing listens - Synchronizing 'love' feedbacks - Audio transcoding for maximum interoperability and reduced bandwith requirements - Multi-library support - ReplayGain support - User management, with several authentication backends - Subsonic/OpenSubsonic API support
